advantages_of_the_tokbor_software_packag: ADVANTAGES OF THE TOK BOR SOFTWARE PACKAGE
and_this_means_that_all_electric_car_own: And this means that all electric car owners in Uzbekistan will know about the location, status and characteristics of your charging station!
choose_your_option_of_cooperation: Choose your option of cooperation, suitable for you:
company_has_been_supplying: The “TOK BOR” company has been supplying, accommodating and maintaining electric vehicle charging stations in Uzbekistan since 2020.
company_that_wants_to_increase: Any company that wants to increase its brand image and loyalty among an understanding audience, and most importantly, gain access to a new segment of car owners, which consists of the most highly profitable consumers, can become our partner by placing charging stations for electric vehicles at their locations.
create_your_network_of_charging_stations: Create your network of charging stations
description_of_all_stations_are_online: All TOK BOR stations are always connected to the server. Using our application, users immediately receive information about charging stations and their workload.
description_type_of_cooperation: Only with us! When installing TOK BOR electric charging stations, we will provide the following:
for_those_organizations: For those organizations or individuals who also want to have a stable income, our company has developed profitable offers for the development of its own network of electric vehicle charging stations.
have_intensive_experience: Having extensive experience in organizing a network of electric vehicle charging stations, TOK BOR has really effective tools for the successful development of your business.
high_quality_equipment: High-quality equipment, specially designed for our climatic features
if_you_have_a_suitable_location: If you have a suitable location with free electrical capacity, but you are not ready for direct investments
in_addition_to_providing_a_wide_range_of: In addition to providing a wide range of stations for any budget and technical characteristics - from AC stations to fast terminals for 40, 60, 80, 120 and 160 and 200 kW, and equipment installation services with warranty and post-warranty service, we will make each location of your charging stations network to the TOK BOR mobile app.
largest_operator: Today it is the largest operator in this field. Our network is already the largest in Uzbekistan today, and since we see huge potential in the industry, and every day a growing number of electric vehicles, we have plans to rapidly expand it and promote it in all regions of our country
our_costumers_charging: Our customers who have charging stations
statics_on_the_growth:
Statistics on the growth
of electric vehicles number
what_the_provide_for_any_of_cooperation: What we provide for any type of cooperation:
when_installing_charging_stations: When installing charging stations, we will register your location in our TOKBOR app, a public resource where all  electric car owners will know about you.
